stat_priorities: SPD 180-220+ (low base SPD 97, needs heavy investment)
ACC 200-250+ (Stun A1 + Decrease DEF A2 landing)

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: Decrease DEF support: 200 ACC (Decrease DEF 60% landing), 180-200 SPD (speed tune), 100% C.RATE, 200% C.DMG, ATK%. Issue: A2 only utility (4→3 turn CD booked), no multi-hit for Warmaster procs, downgraded 5★→4★ community feedback. Use if no better Decrease DEF option (Rhazin, Drexthar, etc.).
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: Wave clear nuker: 200 SPD, 200 ACC (Stun + Decrease DEF), 100% C.RATE, 250% C.DMG, ATK%. A3 Merciless Assault 4.2 ATK +50% vs stunned/frozen enemies = hardest hitting AOE. Good for waves, weak for boss nuking (needs control debuff setup).
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: Control synergy: 220 SPD (low base 97 issue), 250 ACC (Hard floors), 100% C.RATE, 300% C.DMG, ATK%. Pair with control champions (Kymar, Lyssandra, Psylar) for A3 damage boost. A1 stun lock useful trash waves. Issue: Low base SPD, needs speed tuning after controllers.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: TOP TIER NUKER (Patch 4.70 Oct 2021 buffs): 220-250 SPD (after speed lead + speed booster), 100% C.RATE, 300%+ C.DMG, ATK%. A3 one-shot potential (4.2 ATK +50% vs stunned = 6.3 effective multiplier). Pair with control champions (Kymar Fear, Lyssandra Freeze) for damage boost. Community: 'Top 5 Arena nuker', 'World destroyer'. MUST BOOK A2 (Decrease DEF setup CD 4→3).
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: Orcs carry: 200 SPD, 200 ACC, 100% C.RATE, 250% C.DMG, ATK%. Aura +50 ACC Faction Crypts useful. A1 stun lock + A3 AOE nuke good FW waves. Issue: Glass cannon, needs survivability gear.

recommended_gear: Savage + Cruel (Arena PRIMARY): Savage ignore DEF%, Cruel boost C.DMG. Maximize one-shot potential vs tanky arena teams. Savage + C.DMG set standard arena nuker build.

Relentless + Crit Damage (Turn cycling cheese): Relentless 18% extra turn + A1 Stun 50% extra turn = 68% extra turn chance total. Community tested: 3-4 consecutive turns common. Pairs A1 stun→A1 stun→AOE nuke. Requires accuracy for stun landing.

Lifesteal + Speed (PVE sustain): Low base SPD 97 needs Speed set. Lifesteal offsets glass cannon HP. Good for dungeon waves + CB if no better option. MUST pair with control champions for A3 damage boost.
Savage + Perception (Late-game arena): Perception +ACC for stun landing, Savage ignore DEF. Alternative to Savage+Cruel if ACC too low. 200-250 ACC target for reliable stun A1.
2x Offense + Speed (Budget build): Low base SPD 97 issue (originally SPD 87 pre-buff). Speed set mandatory early/mid game. Offense sets boost ATK% for nuking. Replaced by Savage late-game.

arena: Offense tree: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Whirlwind of Death, Ruthless Ambush, Cycle of Violence, Opportunist, Kill Streak, Helmsmasher (T6 nuker)
Defense tree: Defiant, Improved Parry, Bloodthirst, Harvest Despair, Retribution, Deterrence (survivability)

Defense tree secondary (survivability, low base DEF 694 + low base SPD 97 = glass cannon)

blessings: Phantom Touch (Arena PRIMARY): Damage dealer role, arena one-shot nuking. Synergy with A3 massive multiplier.
Crushing Rend (Late-game nuker): Increase C.DMG on kills, snowball damage. Good for wave clear dungeons + FW.
Lightning Cage (Arena control): Stun synergy, A1 stun lock + Lightning Cage proc. Alternative to Phantom Touch if team lacks control.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI behavior FIXED Patch 4.70 (Oct 2021). Pre-buff: Poor AI + low base SPD 87 = vault lord. Post-buff: AI tool addition + SPD buff 87→97 + skill adjustments = TOP TIER. AI now prioritizes A3 (AOE nuke) > A2 (Decrease DEF) > A1 (stun). Acceptable for auto-play.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Relentless stun lock, Arena one-shot, Control synergy
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: RELENTLESS CHEESE: Relentless set 18% extra turn + A1 Stun 50% extra turn = 68% total extra turn chance (community tested). Can chain 3-4 consecutive A1 stuns (stun→stun→stun→AOE nuke). Requires 200+ ACC for stun landing. Community: 'Monster that gives himself extra turns'. ARENA CHEESE: A3 Merciless Assault 4.2 ATK +50% damage vs stunned/frozen/feared = 6.3 effective multiplier (one of hardest hitting abilities in Raid). Pair with control champions (Kymar Fear, Lyssandra Freeze, Psylar Decrease SPD) for guaranteed damage boost. HellHades: 'TOP TIER NUKER', 'World destroyer in Arena'. Community: 'Top 5 Arena nuker post-Patch 4.70'.

mechanics_advisory: REDEMPTION ARC LEGENDARY - Originally 'BAD' → reevaluated 'EXCELLENT' → Patch 4.70 Oct 2021 buffs = TOP TIER ARENA NUKER. Historical issues: Low base SPD 87 (slowest in game), poor AI, underwhelming damage. Patch 4.70 fixes: AI tool addition (manual skill priority), base SPD buff 87→97, skill adjustments. Community consensus: 'One of most enjoyable Raid videos' (HellHades), 'Top 5 Arena nuker', 'World destroyer'. SKILL ANALYSIS: A1 Stunning Strength (3.4 ATK, 50% Stun, grants Extra Turn if stun lands) - TURN CYCLING ENGINE. Relentless set = 68% extra turn chance, can chain 3-4 consecutive stuns. A2 Wild Swing (4.3 ATK AOE, 75%→100% Decrease DEF 60% 2 turns booked, CD 4→3 booked) - SETUP DEBUFFER. MUST BOOK for 100% uptime Decrease DEF. A3 Merciless Assault (4.2 ATK AOE, +50% damage vs Fear/True Fear/Freeze/Provoke/Sleep/Stun) - HARDEST HITTING AOE IN RAID (6.3 effective multiplier vs controlled enemies). Community tested: 150k+ hits Arena. AURA: +50 ACC Faction Crypts (Orcs only) - specialized FW utility. PAIRING STRATEGY: MUST pair with control champions for A3 damage boost. Best combos: Kymar (AOE Fear + skill reset), Lyssandra (AOE Freeze + TM boost), Psylar (AOE Decrease SPD + stun set), Umbral Enchantress (AOE Provoke). Speed tune: Controller first → Robar nukes (low base SPD 97 issue). CLAN BOSS CONTROVERSY: Originally rated 5★ CB (Ayumilove) → downgraded 4★ after community backlash. Community: 'Just Decrease DEF not 5★', 'Tomb Lord (DEF+ATK down + poisons + 3-hit A1) only 3★ but Robar 5★?'. Ayumilove response: 'Robar 60% Decrease DEF 100% uptime useful' → downgraded anyway. Reality: Weak CB choice (no multi-hit for Warmaster, no other utility, Force affinity weak vs Spirit CB). VERDICT: TOP TIER ARENA SPECIALIST. Build for arena one-shot nuking (Savage+Cruel, 300%+ C.DMG, pair with controllers). Avoid CB (use Rhazin/Drexthar for Decrease DEF). Relentless cheese viable for stun lock fun. Historical context: Patch 4.70 Oct 2021 transformation, Patch 4.20 May 2021 earlier buffs, Patch 3.10 Jan 2021 adjustments. Community: 'Great buff by Plarium', 'Robar Arena Nuker Build Top 5'.
